client.game

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • client.game.GameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockGM

    public class GameManager
extends java.util.Observable
implements IGameManager
    Manages a single game
